segments.text: Good morning , Sir . Can I help you with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so . I'm not actually a customer here , but I saw an advertisement in yesterday's newspaper about your new bank card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Yes , the advertisement has proven very effective . Would you like to apply for a card with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . But I suppose I'll have to open an account with you first , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . But don't worry ; it's a very simple procedure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I open an account with you today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , it can be done right this minute . If you could just fill in this application form for me ? Do you have your ID card with you ? I'll need to see that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here you go . And sign here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . That's being processed now . As soon as the account is set up , we can issue you with a card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So quick and easy ! Thanks very much .
segments.speaker: S2
